title: Award-Winning Kanha Jungle Eco-Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Guided Nature Walk
description: Nestled within a sprawling 110 acres of land, 58 of which is regrown forest, on the fringes of Kanha National Park, Singinawa Jungle Lodge is the luxurious, intimate and ecologically responsible wildlife escape of your dreams. Answer the call of the wild as you discover one of India’s largest national parks, staying in award-winning comfort in one of just 12 secluded jungle cottages. Indulge your adventurous side at this top-rated retreat and cut out all the city noise as you unwind with only the native wildlife and perhaps some big cats for company.
offer_address: Village Kohka, PO Tehsil Baihar Kanha, Madhya Pradesh, India 481111

title: Luxe Wildlife Retreat near Kanha National Park with All-Inclusive Dining & Spa Discount
description:
Standing tall as a sentinel in the lap of a lush forest, Kanha Jungle Camp is the ultimate escape for nature lovers. Sleep in a luxury cottage near the Mukki Gate of Kanha National Park - the largest national park in Madhya Pradesh. Surrounded by 40 acres of reforested land and adjoining the buffer forest of Kanha National Park, the property offers peace, relaxation and serenity to all travellers. There are 16 luxury cottages adorned with native prints on the walls and made with indigenous materials to give you the true sense of living nestled amid a forest. A gorgeous swimming pool, serene spa and quaint library are ready to entertain you during your stay.

The hospitality team will greet you with a smile and accommodate all your needs without hesitation. Delicious meals, customised by the chef to suit all kinds of palates, will take you on a joyful gastronomical ride. Endless activities such as birdwatching, nature walks, safaris and cycling adventures can be arranged as per your request (extra charges apply). Take advantage of neighbouring Kanha National Park and embark on a thrilling adventure. A wildlife escape doesn't get better than a stay at Kanha.
offer_address: Kanha, Mukki Gate Santapur, Madhya Pradesh 481111 India

title: Luxurious Jungle Safari Retreat
description: Discover the wildlife in India’s largest national park with an all-meals-inclusive package at a luxury safari lodge stamped with Tripadvisor’s Certificate of Excellence and named one of the Top 10 Must Visit Tourist Places in India by Touropia. Immerse yourself in nature for two or three nights and wind down in your own jungle cottage with daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, a guided nature walk for two and a bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: Village Kohka, PO Tehsil Baihar, Kanha 481111 Madhya Pradesh

title: Wildlife Retreat near Kanha Tiger Reserve with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Situated just 15 minutes from the Mukki Gate of Kanha National Park, The Bagh Kanha sprawls over a 20-acre jungle area. Hidden amid 20,000 fruit and flowering trees, this wildlife retreat is your gateway to one of India's largest tiger reserves. Easily accessible from the major cities of Delhi (18.5-hour drive), Hyderabad (14-hour drive) and Ahmedabad (20-hour drive), this is a haven for wildlife lovers.

Featuring just 50 comfortable rooms, The Bagh Kanha lets you experience tranquility and seclusion, moments from some of India's most thrilling wildlife experiences. When you aren't too busy spotting the big cats, lounge by the resort's gorgeous swimming pool or take a walk through the organic vegetable garden.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Indulge with all-inclusive set-menu meals: daily breakfast, lunch, high tea and dinner
- Explore the nearby village with a guided walk, once during your stay
- Spot some of your favourite birds on a guided bird walk, once during your stay
- Before leaving, don't forget to pick up your gift basket of organic vegetables (one per room)
- Enjoy more delicious moments with a 20% discount on drinks and any additional dining
- Stay connected with your loved ones with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Two children (aged six years and under) stay free in existing bedding with all inclusions.
offer_address: Mukki Gate, Tehsil Baihar, Malajkhand,Distt. Balaghat, Gudma, Madhya Pradesh 481111

title: Luxe Kanha Eco-Lodge Stay with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Nestled within a sprawling 100-acre forest on the fringe of Kanha Tiger Reserve, Singinawa Jungle Lodge is the wildlife escape of your dreams. Answer the call of the wild from your own cosy jungle cottage with all the contemporary comforts. Explore your adventurous side in this top-rated resort (currently number one in Kanha National Park on TripAdvisor) and cut out all the city noise as you unwind in nature's lap with only the big cats for company.

Included in your escape is all-inclusive dining (daily breakfast, lunch, high tea and dinner) a guided nature walk for two and a bottle of wine on arrival.

title: Kanha Eco-Luxe Jungle Lodge with All-Inclusive Dining & Guided Nature Walk
description:
Enter a sanctuary of abundant wildlife, contemporary luxury and enriching forest experiences at Singinawa Jungle Lodge, an eco-luxe property perched on the edge of Kanha National Park. Scattered across 100 acres of wilderness, Singinawa brings you several steps closer to nature and wilderness. Answer the call of the wild as you discover one of India’s largest national parks, staying in award-winning comfort in one of just 12 secluded jungle cottages.

Located just a 15-minute drive from the Mukki Gate of Kanha Tiger Reserve, this eco-retreat is your best bet to experience one of India's most famous tiger reserves. Plus, it's easily accessible from major cities of Delhi, Nagpur and more. Currently ranked #1 hotel in Kanha National Park on Tripadvisor, this gorgeous wildlife destination promises to pamper you with exciting experiences such as safaris, jungle picnics, organic farm visits, village tours and more.
offer_address: Village Kohka, PO Tehsil Baihar Kanha, Madhya Pradesh, India 481111
